title: Taboola's Singolda: Advertising Shift to 'Storytelling' (Audio)
itunes:title: Taboola's Singolda: Advertising Shift to 'Storytelling' (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Adam Singolda, Founder and CEO of Taboola, on the company's recent acquisition, and the Internet ad space.
